item.title: How This Brand Scored 1 Million Social Impressions With a Clever Influencer Strategy
item.description: Peach & Lily founder Alicia Yoon gives Inc. an exclusive look at the rollout that made her product launch go viral.

item.title: Bumble Is Losing Paying Users. Here’s Why Its Competitors Are Winning
item.description: Analysts note that Bumble is in the early stages of its turnaround strategy.

item.title: How Colleges and Businesses Have Failed Gen-Z
item.description: Businesses and colleges alike have created one of the worst job markets for college grads in over a decade. Here’s how to turn things around.

item.title: Will iPhone Prices Go Up? Apple Is Investing $100 Billion in U.S. Manufacturing
item.description: Apple made a big pledge at a White House event. But the logistics of creating a gadget like the iPhone, and managing its cost, are complex.

item.title: What Drives Fast Growth Year After Year? New Research Has Some Answers
item.description: Here are the bold strategies that keep companies on the Inc. 5000 list.
